alert.note: Alert for Archer; Baylor; Wichita; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 07 at 9:57PM CDT until July 08 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 460 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 1 AM CDT SATURDAY FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN OKLAHOMA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 19 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OKLAHOMA CANADIAN GRADY KINGFISHER IN NORTHERN OKLAHOMA GARFIELD GRANT IN NORTHWEST OKLAHOMA ALFALFA BLAINE DEWEY MAJOR WOODS IN SOUTHERN OKLAHOMA STEPHENS IN SOUTHWEST OKLAHOMA CADDO COMANCHE COTTON JACKSON KIOWA TILLMAN IN WESTERN OKLAHOMA CUSTER WASHITA IN TEXAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN NORTHERN TEXAS ARCHER BAYLOR WICHITA WILBARGER THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALTUS, ALVA, ANADARKO, ARCHER CITY, BURNS FLAT, CARMEN, CHEROKEE, CHICKASHA, CLINTON, CONCHO, CORDELL, DUNCAN, EL RENO, ENID, FAIRVIEW, FREDERICK, GEARY, HELENA, HENNESSEY, HINTON, HOBART, HOLLIDAY, KINGFISHER, LAKESIDE CITY, LAMONT, LAWTON, LEEDEY, MEDFORD, MUSTANG, OKARCHE, OKEENE, POND CREEK, SCOTLAND, SEILING, SENTINEL, SEYMOUR, SHEPPARD AFB, SNYDER, TALOGA, TEMPLE, TUTTLE, VERNON, VICI, WAKITA, WALTERS, WATONGA, WEATHERFORD, WICHITA FALLS, AND YUKON.
